verbs.description: Former Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice [V: is] drawing on her government experience to help other leaders understand today 's political landscape around the world . Rice joins " CBS This Morning " to discuss her new book , " Political Risk : How Businesses and Organizations Can Anticipate Global Insecurity . " She also discusses President Trump 's upcoming summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and why the president should " beware . "
